name: queo GmbH
tagline: People with Character, Talent, and Passion
description:
queo is more than a full-service agency: we offer creative communication, custom software, and holistic online marketing. 
As an ambitious and fast growing company, we constantly look for and utilize new opportunities. At queo, people with character, talent, and passion get the chance to take challenges and celebrate great achievements together. 
We look for open-minded and team-oriented talent, who are dedicated, efficient, and fun to work with.
